SCTX - Script Source:
; Universal Cast-When-Used OnTarget - Quest Script
;	This quest script initializes and maintains a paired list
;	of targeted CWU items and their real enchantement.  This list
;	is needed by items using the mwCWUTargetItemScript to replace
;	the placeholder enchantments with the real enchantment.
;	** Please see mwCWUTargetItemScript for further info. **
;
scn mwCWUTargetQuestScript

short DoOnce
array_var itemList
array_var itemEnchantmentMap
;array_var enchantmentList
short stored_MajorVer
short stored_MinorVer
short stored_MinorRevision

Begin MenuMode 1036 ; RaceSex Selection Screen
	; Initialize here so that Jiub's speech isn't slowed down
	
	if DoOnce == 1
		return
	endif

	set stored_MajorVer to 1
	set stored_MinorVer to 7
	set stored_MinorRevision to 0

	call mwCWUTargetEnchantmentListInit

;	Message "CWUTarget v1.7: enchantment table initialized."
	PrintC "CWUTarget v1.7: enchantment table initialized."
	set DoOnce to 1

End

; this script block will update the saved game files if a newer version of this mod is installed
Begin GameMode

	if DoOnce == 1
		; Do the following version check on each gameload to ensure
		; the array is always updated to latest values.
		; Check the version in the saved game file against the
		; hardcoded value to see if we need to update the itemList.
		if (GetGameLoaded)
			if (stored_MajorVer != 1) || (stored_MinorVer != 7) || (stored_MinorRevision != 0)
				ar_Erase itemList
				set DoOnce to 0
			endif
		endif
		return
	endif

	set stored_MajorVer to 1
	set stored_MinorVer to 7
	set stored_MinorRevision to 0

	call mwCWUTargetEnchantmentListInit	
	
	PrintC "CWUTarget v1.7: enchantment table updated."
	set DoOnce to 1

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1640 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
